mapper.insert: insert into data_dictionary (id, dictionary_name, dictionary_core, dictionary_value, data_type, dictionary_type, note) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dictionaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionaryCore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionaryValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dictionaryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update data_dictionary set dictionary_name = #{dictionaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dictionary_core = #{dictionaryCore,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dictionary_value = #{dictionaryValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, data_type = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dictionary_type = #{dictionaryType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, dictionary_name, dictionary_core, dictionary_value, data_type, dictionary_type, note from data_dictionary where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, dictionary_name, dictionary_core, dictionary_value, data_type, dictionary_type, note from data_dictionary
